terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.intro: Please read these terms of service carefully before using the EU2K Hub. By using the service, you agree to the following rules and conditions.
terms_of_service.hint: If you want to read the Terms Of Service in your preferred language, navigate to the Settings page, and change the language to your preferred one.
terms_of_service.messaging_1: The Hub provides opportunities for community and course-based communication.
terms_of_service.messaging_2: Supervision may be partial, especially during the beta period. Please behave respectfully!
terms_of_service.accounts_1: The Hub is a central school system used by teachers, students, and parents.
terms_of_service.accounts_2: The student-specific section can only be accessed with a school account.
terms_of_service.accounts_3: External email addresses can only be used to create parent accounts.
terms_of_service.accounts_4: In case of abuse (e.g., a student using a parent account), we reserve the right to modify the account type, send notifications, and restrict functions.
terms_of_service.accounts_5: Any unauthorized exploitation of the system will result in sanctions.
terms_of_service.responsibility_1: Courses available in the Hub are operated by external or internal organizers (hosts).
terms_of_service.responsibility_2: The course host is solely responsible for the course.
terms_of_service.responsibility_3: The Hub, the school, and the platform developers are not responsible for course content, timing, or technical errors.
terms_of_service.responsibility_4: In the beta phase, a moderation system may not necessarily be available, which is why community functions may be limited or missing.
terms_of_service.feedback_1: We greatly appreciate your feedback - it helps the Hub evolve!
terms_of_service.feedback_2: Feedback and bug reporting functions must be used respectfully and with good intentions.
terms_of_service.feedback_3: In case of abuse (e.g., spamming, false reports, offensive tone), feedback options may be restricted.
terms_of_service.feedback_4: In the beta version, serious rule violations may result in immediate exclusion.
terms_of_service.technical_1: The Hub is optimized for modern browsers. Errors may occur in older browsers.
terms_of_service.technical_2: The service is operating in a pre-beta stage, so instability, errors, or missing features may occur from time to time.
terms_of_service.privacy_1: The Hub uses the basic data linked to the school account (name, email, role).
terms_of_service.privacy_2: Cookies are used exclusively for technical operation (e.g., remembering login).
terms_of_service.privacy_3: More detailed information about data privacy on the Hub, check the Privacy Policy page.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro_text: EU2K Hub is a school community and information platform designed to make everyday life easier and more enjoyable for students, teachers, and parents. We strive for transparency and security in handling our data while providing a friendly and user-friendly environment.
privacy_policy.data_collection_1: Your profile data: Basic info from your Microsoft, Google, or Apple account (name, email, profile picture).
privacy_policy.data_collection_2: School data: Your class name, names and contacts of classmates and teachers, grades, schedule, exams.
privacy_policy.data_collection_4: Extra features data: For example, memories in the Memories Hub, stats from School Wrapped, class and group info.
privacy_policy.data_usage_title: 3. How do we use the data?
privacy_policy.data_usage_text: We use the data exclusively for organizing school life, communication, and providing community functions. We do not sell or share them with external companies for commercial purposes.
privacy_policy.data_access_title: 4. Who has access to the data?
privacy_policy.data_access_text: Only authorized students, teachers, and administrators have access to the data. For certain features (e.g., class profiles), community members can collaboratively edit the content.
privacy_policy.data_security_title: 5. How do we protect your data?
privacy_policy.security_text: The EU2K Hub uses modern security technologies to protect data. Access to data is strictly limited, and every login is authenticated through Microsoft, Google, or Apple accounts.
privacy_policy.data_rights_text: You have the right to access your data, correct it, request its deletion, and restrict certain uses of it. If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact us at any time.
privacy_policy.data_contact_text: If you have any questions about data protection, please write to us at the following email address: turoczi.adam@europa2000.hu

youhub.title: YouHub
youhub.description: We're glad you're so interested in YouHub, but it's still under development and not suitable for use in its current state.
youhub.streak_motivation: If you continue like this, you can perform 2x as well as you expect from yourself!
youhub.calendar_instruction: Scan the QR Code to order!
youhub.camera_blocked_text: We can't use the camera because you haven't given permission. Please allow it so this feature can work!
youhub.permission_popup_text1: To scan QR codes, you need to allow camera usage.
youhub.permission_popup_text2: The Hub never uses your camera automatically.
youhub.permission_popup_text3: You will always get a clear indication in the top right corner when the camera is active.
youhub.permission_popup_text4: If you grant permission now, this feature will become available.
youhub.permission_popup_text5: Additional camera-using features will also be activated.

qr.title: QR-Code
qr.instruction: Scan QR-Codes, authenticate yourself, play, and generate other QR-Codes.
qr.auth_notice: The Authentication function is not yet available in the Hub.
qr.game_notice: The Games function is not yet supported on the Hub.
qr.blocked_text: We can't use the camera because you haven't given permission. Please allow it so this feature can work!
qr.permission_list_1: To scan QR codes, you need to allow camera usage.
qr.permission_list_2: The Hub never uses your camera automatically.
qr.permission_list_3: You will always get a clear indication in the top right corner when the camera is active.
qr.permission_list_4: If you grant permission now, this feature will become available.
qr.permission_list_5: Additional camera-using features will also be activated.

account.title: Account
account.description_part1: Log in with your School Account to access amazing features like Statistics, Personal Notifications, Suggestions, Calendar, and much more. Or use your personal account if you are a parent, so you can supervise your child's activity on the Hub!
account.message_notice: Only you and your supervisor can change this setting.
account.word_filter_placeholder: Type here... (separate words with a comma and a space)
account.word_filter_notice: Type 'Auto' to filter a pre-written list of words.
account.word_filter_notice2: The word filter decides based on the severity of the words and their excessive use.
account.ai_no_acc_notice: You don't need to be signed in to use these features.
account.ai_rec_stay_on: We recommend keeping these features on.
account.ai_correction: AI Spelling Correction in input fields

onboarding_student.title: Welcome to the Hub!
onboarding_student.create_account_description: Please choose an avatar, or use the one provided by your school account!
onboarding_student.notifications_description: Choose what notifications you'd like to receive!
onboarding_student.messages_description: Decide if you're open to private messages!
onboarding_student.terms_title: Please accept the terms of service!
onboarding_student.terms_description: Read through, or learn more, and accept the information, and we're done!
onboarding_student.terms_messaging_1: The Hub provides opportunities for community and course-based communication.
onboarding_student.terms_messaging_2: The Hub provides opportunities for community and course-based communication.
onboarding_student.terms_accounts_1: The Hub is a central, school system that can be used in multiple roles (teacher, student, parent).
onboarding_student.terms_accounts_2: The student-specific section can only be accessed with a school account.
onboarding_student.terms_accounts_3: External email addresses cannot be used, only for creating parent accounts.
onboarding_student.terms_accounts_4: If the system detects abuse (e.g., a student using a parent account), we reserve the right to modify the account type, send notifications, and even restrict functions.
onboarding_student.terms_accounts_5: Any form of system exploitation is not permitted and will result in punishment.
onboarding_student.terms_responsibility_1: Courses available in the Hub are operated by external or internal organizers ('hosts').
onboarding_student.terms_responsibility_2: Only the course host is responsible for the courses.
onboarding_student.terms_responsibility_3: The Hub, the school, and the platform developers are not responsible for course content, timing, or possible technical errors.
onboarding_student.terms_responsibility_4: The Hub does not have a moderation system during the beta phase, so community functions may be limited or missing.
onboarding_student.terms_feedback_1: We greatly appreciate your feedback – it helps the Hub improve!
onboarding_student.terms_feedback_2: However, feedback, bug reporting, and suggestion features should only be used in a respectful, well-intentioned manner.
onboarding_student.terms_feedback_3: Abusive use of the system (e.g., spamming, false reports, offensive tone) may result in restrictions on feedback capabilities.
onboarding_student.terms_feedback_4: If you're using a beta version, you may be immediately excluded from these programs for serious rule violations.
onboarding_student.terms_feedback_5: Since the Hub is still in pre-beta stage, we greatly appreciate your feedback. We can give you some reward after each feedback if your feedback is useful.
onboarding_student.terms_feedback_6: Feedback is evaluated by a human.
onboarding_student.terms_acceptance_text: I accept the terms of service and privacy policy
onboarding_student.teacher_description: It looks like you're a teacher! We greatly appreciate that you're trying to explore the endless possibilities offered by the Hub (well, not quite endless 😊), but the Hub is in the early beta stage. It will be available for teachers soon!
onboarding_student.adult_description: It looks like you're an adult! We greatly appreciate that you're trying to explore the endless possibilities offered by the Hub (well, not quite endless 😊), but the Hub is in the early beta stage. It will be available for adults soon!
onboarding_student.restart_title: Are you sure you want to restart?
onboarding_student.restart_description: This will make the Hub forget your current account on this device, you will lose your preferences and messages if you set up something different than what you originally set up. Are you sure you want to continue?
onboarding_student.delete_profile_title: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
onboarding_student.delete_profile_description: This cannot be undone, all your data stored in the Hub will be lost forever. Are you sure about this?
onboarding_student.login_failed_description: The login was unsuccessful. Please try again!
onboarding_student.restricted_description: The login process has been interrupted. You do not have access to the system. That’s all we know.

suggestion.title: Submit Suggestion
suggestion.hive_tooltip: OkosDoboz will be replaced with the Hive function. From now on, you can submit suggestions here that you previously dropped into OkosDoboz.
suggestion.profile_notice: When you submit the Suggestion, your profile picture will appear publicly to everyone who has the right to view the Suggestion.

settings.title: Settings
settings.stands_behind: Also backed by: EU2K DÖK, EU2K Devs
settings.notifications_notice: While you're at school, you'll receive silent notifications.
settings.notifications_notice_offline: This means you'll still get notifications even if the Hub is not open. This function is not yet supported.
settings.messages_notice: This setting only applies to known contacts!
settings.stats_not_available: This function is not available in beta, we are working very hard to make it available as soon as possible.
settings.events_not_available: This function is not available in beta, we are working very hard to make it available as soon as possible.
settings.messages_not_available: This function is not available in beta, we are working very hard to make it available as soon as possible.
settings.experiments_notice: These are experimental features, they may be unstable, or they have not yet reached their full functionality.
settings.not_found_suggestions: You didn't reccommend anything to the community! Try sharing your ideas through YouHub!
